attributes.additional_details:
Buckminster Rd is used by emergency vehicles responding to calls. This being closed will mean longer more congested routes, adding time onto an emergency call out. 

Anstey Lane/Blackbird Rd are often congested main routes. Blackbird Rd provides an alternative route onto Groby Rd which reduces pressure on Anstey Lane/Blackbird Rd. The closure will cause additional traffic in these congested areas. 

Parking for the primary school will impact on Anstey Lane/Avebury Av residents with the closure.
attributes.background: Stop the proposed closure of Buckminster Road, Leicester from the Anstey Lane Junction to Brading Road.

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
